DataElement.preferredName: Household Survey Past 6 Months Prior Diagnosis Child Live with Others Due to Financial Difficulties Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether, in the 6 months before their childÂ’s diagnosis, a person and their child lived with others due to financial difficulties.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey Past 6 Months Prior Diagnosis Child Live with Others Due to Financial Difficulties
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._Earlier in time or order._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._A question about whether an individual lived with others due to financial difficulties.

Concepts.definition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Concepts.longName: Live with Others Due to Financial Difficulties
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual lived with others due to financial difficulties.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the 6 months before your child's diagnosis, did you and your child had to temporarily live with other people because of financial difficulties?
